name: CroqueManiac
description:
Game made for the second #GranadaJam Game Jam 2016 in 48 hours.

GranadaJam Page: Granada Jam
Puzzle

Are we croquettes or we are men ?

You're a croquette in refrigerator ... And Your Life Is not Easy ( It's cold, the lighting does not help your skin , the not frost syste will dry your nose ... ) . Search exit to Freedom !

DEVELOPMENT TEAM

  • Level and Game Design: Alfonso Jurado, Clemente Solana
  • Programming: Clemente Solana, Karlos
  • 2D Art: Lorena Ruiz, Jesús Jurado

Juego hecho para la segunda game jam de granadajam (Mayo 2016)

Eres una croqueta en un frigorífico...y tu vida no es fácil (hace frío, la iluminación no favorece tu cutis, el no frost te reseca la nariz...). Busca la salida hacia la libertad !
